methodOfCooking: Prepare dough from flour and water. Mix minced meat with vegetables and spices. Stuff the dough with filling, fold into dumplings, and steam for 10-15 minutes.
Cook lentils with spices and simmer until soft. Cook rice separately. Serve the lentils over rice, accompanied by pickles and vegetables.
Fry onion, garlic, and green chili in oil. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Mix in the fermented greens and stir for a few minutes. Serve with rice.
